description: Methodologies and techniques used and deliverables created in developing large-scale information systems, including preliminary planning, feasibility analysis, design implementation, and post-implementation review of the system; a term-long project which familiarizes students with methodology and techniques is required. Same as ACCY 353. Prerequisite: BADM 350.
label: Info Sys Analysis and Design
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Marketing or Information Sys & Info Tech or Supply Chain Management or Business Process Management or Management major(s) or minor(s). Restricted to students with Junior or Senior class standing.
